name: AGM-62 Walleye II ER/DL
description:
The AGM-62 Walleye is a television-guided glide bomb which was produced by Martin Marietta and used by the United States Armed Forces from the 1960s-1990s.

The ER/DL in the name indicates Extended Range / Data Link.

The AN/AWW-13 Advanced Data Link Pod is used to communicate with the Walleye II ER/DL. It allows for retargeting of the weapon after it has been launched by transmitting and receiving post launch slew and lock-on commands.
